survey_brief: This survey aims to gather student and faculty feedback on the current bicycle infrastructure and amenities on campus to identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use a bicycle on campus?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button layout for simplicity. Ensure options cover all possible usage frequencies.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use a bicycle on campus?

questions.question_text: What are the primary reasons you use a bicycle on campus? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes). Include an 'Other' option with an open-text follow-up if selected.

script.question_text: What are the primary reasons you use a bicycle on campus? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current bicycle parking availability on campus?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction measurement. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current bicycle parking availability on campus?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in campus bicycle infrastructure? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: More bike lanes on campus roads
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes). Include an 'Other' option with an open-text follow-up if selected.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in campus bicycle infrastructure? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: More bike lanes on campus roads

questions.question_text: Have you experienced any safety concerns while cycling on campus? If yes, please describe.
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to allow detailed responses. Ensure the field is large enough for detailed feedback.

script.question_text: Have you experienced any safety concerns while cycling on campus? If yes, please describe.

questions.question_text: Would you be interested in a campus bike-sharing program if one were introduced?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button layout for simplicity.

script.question_text: Would you be interested in a campus bike-sharing program if one were introduced?

questions.question_text: Any additional comments or suggestions regarding bicycle infrastructure on campus?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to capture any final thoughts. Ensure the field is large enough for detailed feedback.

script.question_text: Any additional comments or suggestions regarding bicycle infrastructure on campus?
